com.mbc.receiptprinter.converter

Class ConvertFieldsToAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mbc.receiptprinter.converter.ConvertFieldsToAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConvertFields<Address>

    public class ConvertFieldsToAddress
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConvertFields<Address>
    Converts fields found in a line from an Address data file into an Address bean
    See Also:
    ConvertFields

      • convert

        public Address convert(java.lang.String[] fields)
        Description copied from interface: ConvertFields
        Converts a fields array (which represents a line in a data file) into it's corresponding bean
        Specified by:
        convert in interface ConvertFields<Address>
        Parameters:
        fields - The String array that is extracted from a line in a data file through using an ASCII field delimiter
        Returns:
        A bean that corresponds with the data file used to extract the fields from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If fields is null or not the correct length

      • hasMultipleFields

        public boolean hasMultipleFields()
        Description copied from interface: ConvertFields
        Used to indicate if the data file has multiple fields in it or not
        Specified by:
        hasMultipleFields in interface ConvertFields<Address>
        Returns:
        true if the data file has multiple fields in it; false otherwise
